values: basically i found out yesterday that i'll get into michigan tech no matter what..... such a relief. i'm having a damn good week. \m/

i'm feelin good today. christmas was awesome, i got a ton of cool presents (a LOT more than i dreamed of getting, it almost felt wrong) and it was just a good time cuz everyone was in a great, cheerful mood. new years was fun too, a ton of people came over (lol i played AvP2 and Black Hawk Down most of the time, but oh well) and there was good food and good conversations. i talked to my uncle about college and he explained ROTC to me some more and i learned that 4 years of active duty are required once you get out of college, but it's basically reserves until that point. i was glad to hear about the active duty part, cuz that's kinda what i wanna do, and it's gonna help pay for most of my college tuition stuff, which is sweet. i've been doin stuff around the house all day mostly, but now i'm just takin a break, listenin to some music. god i love metallica.
http://mno55xhalycon.livejournal.com/6854.html

lol i just played a few of the craziest AvP2 matches ever... dammit i love that game! i hate school but it's winter break and it's all good now. i miss tiffany so damn much and i'm going insane wishing i could see her again. i've worked 28.5 hours so far this week (HUGE ass paycheck coming i hope) and i work another like 19 next week, so lotsa money for me. i've been in a very contemplative mood lately, which i half like and half dislike. but i think it's doing me good, not quite sure how, but it is. pretty much it. i love you my sexay pig that can sing like a black woman! WPODA!

i don't know about you, but i have certain periods, more like phases that i go through when i'm lazy as hell and procrastinate. in the end, i end up realizing it was stupid to do so. now is that end. for quite awhile now i've been a lazy ass again, and now i'm gettin out of that groove. i did this in 7th grade too, kinda in 10th, and i'm extremely sick of it, i'm sick of the constant underlying worry i have when i do that stuff. thus, i'm quitting it. no more procrastination, no more being a lazy ass. i've been both people, and now i'm choosing to stay the person who works hard and gets his stuff done on time or ahead of time. no more worrying and skimming by, especially in school. i think i've been a little bit too focused on me me me lately... i hate to say it, but i think edina had that effect on me to some degree. i'm not blaming edina, i'm blaming myself for not preventing it like i thought i would long ago. anyhow, stuff's goin great now and it's only getting better, which is always good. i'm gonna keep it that way this time around.
http://mno55xhalycon.livejournal.com/5992.html

i went snowboarding yesterday and it was a great time, i learned frontside boardslides, backside 180's, and i can butter pretty well now too. i'm pretty stressed out about college stuff... i need to get all my apps in and get it over with, i'm just torturing myself but i'm soooooooo sick of school and everything, snowboarding really helps me forget about all of that, but i still gotta get it done. i'm sick of all the corporate shit at work too. we gotta carry around these stupid ass bags on our shoulders and ask EVERYONE if they want one. well the only time someone would want one is if they're buying like 10 DVDs or CDs... who in god's name buys that many cds or dvds at a time? 1 in about every 10000 people.... what's the point then? if they want a bag, they'll find one on the stands we have. there's a lot of stupid stuff like that at best buy, but oh well. it's work, and work is money, so i work. time to go to work.
http://mno55xhalycon.livejournal.com/5744.html

well... i haven't written in quite awhile now. life's been busy lately and i'm really getting anxious to be in college (especially in michigan with scott and tiffany). that's really the one thing i want most now, i just know it's gonna be an incredible time. i know this sounds really really stupid, but i wanna make snowboarding work for me. i wanna be a damn pro. i'm gonna work my ass off this year and not be such a pussy about hitting things, and push myself. i know if i can do that i'll do great and then if i keep doing it, i'll get sponsored. college is sort of a back up plan in case stuff doesn't work out. on another note, i miss tiffany so much. i haven't been able to talk to her all that much lately cuz of school and homework mostly, along with being busy with family stuff and work. i feel terrible for it too and she always tells me "ohh no, don't feel bad about it, it's not your fault" but i still see it as my fault, at least partially. whatever though, hopefully stuff settles down (which it should) and we can talk more often. overall i think life is pretty damn good right now though. this may sound dumb too, but i really think i'm figuring out who i am finally. i'm not being so passive about everything and it feels good. i'm still passive about certain things.... like it takes a LOT to get me made, stuff like that, but meh.... it just feels really good right now. anyhow, i'm off to bed cuz i'm tired as hell. g'night, and tiff, if you read this, i love you :)

i haven't written in quite awhile and i got the urge, so here i am. friday was the most incredible night ever. a bunch of people asked me about it and some were just jackasses about it, but others were excited for me and that was cool. seeing her just made me love her so much more (if that's even possible). i've never met anyone as kind or considerate as her in my life. it was totally surreal and i feel like we were only together for like a half hour, even though it was like 8 hours. i couldn't say bye at all, whenever i did i was like dammit i can't, and no lie, i probably did that about 20 times. i know she said this too, but i feel like we totally moved up a level, it's just awesome. i love her so much. i g2g to work, 27 hours this week, no fun. but oh well. anyhow, later. pokos, if you read this, i love you :)

You're Most Like The Season Winter ... You're often depicted as the cold, distant season.
But you're incredibly intelligent, mature and
Independant. You have an air of power around
you - and that can sometimes scare people off.
You're complex, and get hurt easily - so you
rarely let people in if you can help it. You
can be somewhat of a loner, but just as easily
you could be the leader of many. You Tend to be
negative, and hard to relate to, but you give
off a relaxed image despite being insecure -
and secretly many people long to be like you,
not knowing how deep the Winter season really
is. Well done... You're the most inspirational of
seasons :)

i haven't updated this in awhile so i figured i would. life's lookin up right now. i started doin' shitty in school, kinda losing my grip towards the end of first quarter, but i pulled it all back together and i feel good about it, so i'm kinda excited to do well second quarter. i gotta get crackin' on applying to colleges, i'm behind on that though. i'm really excited for college, i think it'll be really fun to be on my own and be able to do whatever i want, be able to run my life just how i want to. i know certain things will be difficult, but with time i'll learn and all will be well. lately i've just been feeling really good. i'm stoked that winter's almost here, i've been watchin videos about every day now lol. i think i've seen afterbang (the coolest snowboarding movie ever, by robot food) about 10 times now, and i'm still not sick of it. i think this year is gonna be a good year for me in snowboarding. hopefully what i've learned by skating this summer will carry over and i'll be hitting rails and takin the booters and everything much more comfortably now. i know it sounds kinda far-fetched, but being a pro snowboarder would just be incredible. i think if i work my ass off from now on, i can get good enough to get noticed. i know a kid at my school who was an am for nitro, and he just turned pro this season for them, and i think he's with mission six, maybe grenade, and subject too. so that's kinda inspiring for me. i used to think it'd be DAMN hard to get sponsored since i'm from minnesota (we kinda lack the season and the altitude that others out west get), but he proved me wrong. this is gettin long and i'm just babbling now, so i'll stop here.

Strong

You possess enough inner security to deal with your
partner having a life of his/her own. You are
able to tackle the occassional jealous twinge
by inviting a 'rival' to dinner instead of
making a fuss.

Nothing can rattle the strong lover. You have
developed a kind of inner courage that allows
you to deal with your difficulties without
getting upset and lets you provide a shoulder
to cry on when things get tough. Best of all,
you are unlikely to get jealous about either
petty things or real infidelities. This
doesn't mean that your partner can et away with
lying and cheating. Instead, you might simply
pack your bags one day and walk out the door.
If this happens your lover could discover that
he/she has lost a solid and reliable partner,
someone well worth holding on to. But then,
the strong silent type isn't neccessarily
everyone's cup of tea. In bed you are not
overtly wild and explicit, but your lover can
sense deep currents of passion that flow
beneath the surface. The understated can be
very erotic in its own right - this is your
appeal.

How Jealous a Lover are You?

Supportive

Your ability to be supportive and friendly inspires
warmth and loyalty in return. And you are
mature enough to see that even if you love
someone you shouldn't step in and do
everything.

Alot of people adore a supportive lover like you
because your genuine thoughtfulness and the
actions you take on behalf of your lover make
you a wonderful and valuable partner. But
beware of being taken for granted, and be
careful of stifling others by being too eager
to help. Also, the supportive lover is very
likely to be strong on skills such as empathy,
and probably also has that rare talent, the
ability to know when a lover needs to be left
alone, which is vital if you are to avoid being
overly controlling. If you are a supportive
lover, then your personality profile is one of
the most mature. Your empathy and
understanding translate into the bedroom to
make a really sensitive and responsive lover
who knows all the right moves to make without
being told - a most valuable skill indeed!

savor every minute of the good times. While

broken. Vampires are the best friends to have
because they are sensible.

i had a weird day today. first, my mom blew up on me. then, i had to rake leaves. then, my mom blew up on me again. after that, we figured shit out and it's all good now, and now here i am. i made a huge realization (at least for me) today: none (except for 4 or so) of my "friends" from edina aren't really even friends. i don't have like 3 or 4 people that i'm awesome friends with at all in this city or at my school. i never do stuff with friends, and i used to think that was because i'm just not talkative, but i realized now that it's not that at all. it's just complete conflict of interest. NONE, and i repeat NONE of the people in edina share interests at the same level as i do. scott, you're the exception, but you don't live here anymore obviously (but hell, you're still even my best friend). i wish i had a group of friends that was like you and i are. i dunno, we just have a great time and we get along so well. well we're both highly addicted to AvP2 also :P so that might have a wee bit to do with it. but i have hope for college, i think people are gonna get a lot more mature and all will be well (or at least better). on another note, i miss tiffany. a lot. it's only been 2 days haha, but still, i won't get to talk to her for another 2. i'm such a damn hyprocrite and i feel kinda stupid for having an online relationship, but i've come to the conclusion that i don't give a fuck anymore. honestly, i'm happier with tiffany than i've ever been with any girlfriends i've had that live near me, and i think that says a lot. and it's not like we don't know eachother, we talk at least every other day for a long ass time, and every time it only gets better. think whatever you want, that it's lame or anything like that, but it's not to me. anyhow, i gotta get goin cuz i have a meeting at church for my ethiopian project. peace.
http://mno55xhalycon.livejournal.com/3163.html

i just had the shittiest day i've had in a long time... and sadly, it's over a damn class at school. AP calculus BC (basically the AP version of an AP version) is the most useless class ever. mr woelber is a shitty teacher and teaches waaaaaaaaaay too fast, then he yells at me for not taking notes. i don't take notes because he goes so damn fast that if i worry about writing all the shit down, then i don't understand anything he just said. he doesn't get that though. not to mention the fact that EVERY night we have an hour of homework guaranteed. i find that depressing. i think the only decent thing today was talkin to tiffany... AP calc BC can kiss my ass, and so can mr woelber. anyone who's reading this is probably laughing because i'm pissed off at something so piddly, but this is the single class i wanted to do well in (i wanna major in mechanical engineering, so math is very very important to me) and i'm gettin like 50%'s on tests and shit. granted, a 50% in that class is worth a C, but fuck that! 50%!! that's terrible! anyhow, i'm off to bed to calm down. bitch bitch bitch, moan moan moan... i know. but oh well, that's what a journal can be for. peace.

i went to iowa state this past weekend to check it out, and i knew this before, but i realized it more than ever this time: iowa consists of corn, corn, corn, corn, and flat land, flat land, flat land, and flat land. it was a cool school though, the campus is awesome. my cousin and i tagged along to a party with his friend (which was great fun, drunk people are funny to watch). i can't wait till tiff and i can live together when college finally rolls around. i swear, every day it gets worse. i think more and more about her, and i go more and more crazy wishing i could see her. i would be happy seeing her for like 2 seconds, just as long as i got to see her in person. i keep seeing this couple at school that for some reason strikes me as how tiffany and i would be. they're always walkin together, holdin hands, the guy's a skater, and i don't really know much else why it reminds me of us, but it does. every time i see em i think of tiffany and i and just wish i could be with her doing that kinda stuff, the simplest things. i wanna know what it's like to kiss her, hold her hand, hug her, hold her, see her smile and laugh, all of those things. i wanna know all of her little habits, good and bad, all of her friends, what her typical day's like, and the list goes on. it sounds kinda stalker-ish, but it's really not at all, it's just curiosity and love for her, and i know she feels the same way (so if you think it IS stalker-ish, well then at least it's mutual). on another note, i wish it would just snow dammit. i've been watchin snowboarding videos almost daily now (about 3 of them over and over.... would you guess that i'm addicted?), and i'm going crazy wishing snow was here. i'm feelin good about it this year, like i'm gonna learn a lot of new tricks since i've gotten better at skateboarding (the skills obviously cross over). anyways, i'm tired, so i'm off to bed. if you're readin this tiff, i love you :) i'll be havin some mighty fine dreams

i can't frickin wait until i go to michigan tech (at least i hope i do) and live with tiffany... it's gonna be unreal. i'll have tiffany, snow, woods, lake superior, mountains, cold weather, fishing, everything i could possibly want, while designed and engineering things, working with engines and all that. heaven. i'm gettin really sick of school though, especially AP chemistry. i hate lab notebooks, they're stupid as hell. if i were a real chemist, then they, they make sense. i guess for me they don't make sense cuz engineering has nothing to do whatsoever with chem labs. oh well. i miss tiffany, but there's only like a month left till i get to see her. we probably will get to share a hotel room for a night, how cool would that be? i've never actually slept with a girl. i don't mean having sex, i mean just plain old sleeping. i wanna just lay there together with her and be able to see her and kiss her and all of that. it sounds kinda dumb, but that's what i want most right now. anyhow, i g2g to bed. haha.... wow. tiff, if you're readin this, check out the zoning out i did just now, lol. designed and engineering, and then they, they make sense. lol oh well. i miss you and i love you so much

it's the day after my birthday, but my mom actually celebrated it today... and you know what she gave me? 125 one dollar bills... in a frickin grocery bag, all scattered. lol i opened it up and saw all this cash just sittin in the bag like 2 inches deep and was like "hehehehehe...." so it was a good day, i'll be savin that money for a truck. i miss tiffany so much, we haven't been able to talk much at all lately, and this weekend i'm gonna be gone most of the time for homecoming, so that's even less than i get to talk to her. tonight's the homecoming game, that should be fun, and then tomorrow the afterparty is gonna be sweetness. i haven't written in awhile, so i figured i'd update this thing, but i'm pretty much done now. oh yeah, siddhartha is a crazy book... i like it though, it's definitely interesting. anyhow, i'm headin to the game, so adios (whoever that is?) tiff, if you read this, i love you and i miss you so much.

i miss tiffany so damn much. this distance thing sucks butt, but i really don't care, i'm waitin it out. i can't even imagine how awesome it's gonna be when we're finally together in michigan or wherever it may be. i had this crazy dream last night... i was this little miniature person and me and my brother were fighting in the basement of some crazy room of a house that looked like blood gulch in halo.. there were like battecruisers from starcraft and scorpions from halo and tanks from battlefield 1942 and all this other shit that we were fighting in... lol i dunno, i have some weird dreams. next thing i know, i'm flying in the battlecruiser upstiars into this bedroom... the stairs are white and lit up with little light strips along the sides, and the room is all white too with a candle lighting it up. i saw the room and like right then, i half woke up and just started thinkin how i couldn't wait to have my own room like that with tiffany... just like in our song, the early november - just enough. kinda crazy, but i know stuff is gonna work out with us, we're too much alike for it not to. not only that, i have so much damn fun with her and she's just beautiful and damn, the whole package. i couldn't have asked for more, except for being able to see her sooner. a little over a month till i get to see her in florida, so i'm waitin for that. i love her so much. man, it's just gonna be perfect.

black then white are all i see, in my infancy.
red and yellow then came to be, reaching out to me. 
lets me see.
as below, so above and beyond, i imagine
drawn beyond the lines of reason.
push the envelope. watch it bend.
